messages.title: Saving our A & E
messages.content: It is really great that so many local people are backing my campaign to save the Accident and Emergency units at Ealing Hospital and Central Middlesex.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning to save the Accident and Emergency units at Ealing Hospital and Central Middlesex from closure.

issues.environment: protect against overdevelopment and save Gunnersbury Park
issues.health: Campaign to save the Accident and Emergency units at Ealing Hospital and Central Middlesex.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your local MP, I will always put local people first - just like I have on my campaigns to protect NHS services, stop town centre overdevelopment and save Gunnersbury Park.

contactInformation.address: Flat 3, Pimento Court, Olive Road, Ealing, W5 4JQ

leaflet.additionalNotes: Encourages to sign petition and support the campaign to save emergency units.
